Posts.Content: Hi Bev, I am definitely no expert in what you can and cant do but just in my opinion I don't see doing Slimming world to be a problem. I do this diet to lose weight myself & nothing on it would be inappropriate to eat whilst on chemo I don't believe. Just make sure with any fresh veg/fruit they are thoroughly washed and try to stay away from Eggs unless hard boiled. Other than that I cant see slimming world as a problem :) Im not sure about weight watchers as haven't ever looked at what people eat on that. Take care xx
